title: Has the pixel 2xl issue with constant wifi dropping after upgrading to Android 10 been fixed yet?
content: I'm on my third Pixel 2xl and staying on Android 9 because both previous phones, immediately after updating to Android 10, lost wifi connection consistency.  In December, Google admitted a problem and said they'd have a fix in "a couple of months", but I've seen nothing since then.  Is it fixed or not?
